WorkItem.Description:
Currently PHPExcel_Writer_Excel5 is not making use of the built-in colors for specifying colors of fonts, fills etc:
 
0: EGA Black
1: EGA White
2: EGA Red
3: EGA Green
4: EGA Blue
5: EGA Yellow
6: EGA Magenta
7: EGA Cyan
 
This reduces the number of custom colors that can be used in the workbook.
 
For more informations, see "OpenOffice.org's Documentation of the Microsoft Excel File Format", section about PALETTE record.
WorkItem.Summary: Make use built-in color index 0x00 - 0x07 in PHPExcel_Writer_Excel5

Comments.Message:
Fixed in SVN
